Name: *open
Doc: If True, the dialog is visible. If False, it is hidden.

Name: on_action
Doc:
Name of a function that is triggered when a button is pressed. The parameters of that function are all optional:
  • state (`State^`): state instance.
  • id (optional[str]): the identifier of the dialog.
  • action (optional[str]): the name of the action that provoked the change.
  • payload
    • args: List where the first element contains the index of the selected label.

Name: close_label
Doc: The tooltip of the top-right close icon button. In the on_action function, args will hold -1.

Name: labels
Doc: A list of labels to show in a row of buttons at the bottom of the dialog. The index of the button in the list is reported as args in the on_action function (-1 for the close icon).

Name: width
Doc:
The width, in CSS units, of this dialog.
(CSS property)

Name: height
Doc:
The height, in CSS units, of this dialog.
(CSS property)
